SectionHero.headline: Collect customer feedback to build better products
SectionHero.paragraph: Create a feedback board in minutes, prioritize features, and build products your customers will love.

SectionPricing.label: Pricing
SectionPricing.headline: A pricing that adapts to your needs

questions.question: Can I create multiple boards?
questions.answer: Yes, you can create and manage as many feedback boards as you need from a single dashboard.

questions.question: Do users need to sign up to vote?
questions.answer: No, we've made it easy for your users to engage. They can upvote and post feedback instantly without creating an account.

questions.question: How do I share my board?
questions.answer: Each board comes with a unique public link that you can share with your users via email, social media, or your website.

questions.question: How is feedback prioritized?
questions.answer: Feedback is automatically ranked by vote count, so the most important requests and issues are always visible at the top.

questions.question: Can I moderate content?
questions.answer: Yes, you have full administrative control to delete any duplicate, irrelevant, or inappropriate posts directly from your dashboard.
